item.title: GPT-5 is supposed to be nicer now
item.description: OpenAI announced late Friday that it’s updating its latest model to be “warmer and friendlier.”

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ creators may be leaving Netflix

item.title: Duolingo CEO says controversial AI memo was misunderstood

item.title: Judge says FTC investigation into Media Matters ‘should alarm all Americans’
item.description: A federal judge has blocked the FTC's investigation into Media Matters research around advertising and antisemitic content on X.

item.title: AI-powered stuffed animals are coming for your kids
item.description: Do A.I. chatbots packaged inside cute-looking plushies offer a viable alternative to screen time for kids? Maybe not.
